# Issue Template

Use this template to document issues, bugs, features, and tasks with comprehensive details.

**Used by:** TPO Agent for creating issue documentation  
**Output Location:** `.github/issues/{issue_number}/ISSUE.md`

## Issue Header

# Issue #{number}: {title}

**Status:** {OPEN/IN_PROGRESS/IN_REVIEW/CLOSED}  
**Created:** {YYYY-MM-DD}  
**Updated:** {YYYY-MM-DD}  
**URL:** [{repo}#{number}]({issue_url})

## Issue Details

| Field | Value |
|-------|-------|
| **Labels** | {label1, label2, ...} |
| **Assignees** | {assignee1, assignee2, ...} |
| **Milestone** | {milestone_name or None} |
| **Comments** | {count} |
